title: Honda Motorcycle & Scooter India's 125cc bike Shine hits cumulative sales milestone of 1 cr units
description: Honda Motorcycle and Scooter India (HMSI) on Tuesday said its 125cc bike Shine has touched the cumulative sales milestone of one crore units. Launched in India in 2006, the model crossed 10 lakh cumulative sales in 2010, 30 lakh in 2014. In 2017, it reached the 50 lakh unit sales milestone and the following year, it touched the 70 lakh unit sales mark, HMSI said in a statement.
